lst.name: sentence
lst.str: They said the market for denim is more fragmented than Burlington contends and that Burlington has the ability to switch between light weight and heavy weight denim production as demand and price dictate.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Lawyers for Samjens contended that Painewebber and Ammeen withdrew as potential advisers because Burlington chairman Frank Greenberg had called a PaineWebber executive and threatened legal action if PaineWebber got involved in an effort to takeover Burlilgnton.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "The ultimate question is not the price per share or the profit, but rather the permissable standards of conduct for those who would takeover an American company," said burlington lawyer Humphrey.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: They said the market for denim is more fragmented than Burlington contends and that Burlington has the ability to switch between light weight and heavy weight denim production as demand and price dictate.

lst.str: Lawyers for Samjens contended that Painewebber and Ammeen withdrew as potential advisers because Burlington chairman Frank Greenberg had called a PaineWebber executive and threatened legal action if PaineWebber got involved in an effort to takeover Burlilgnton.

lst.str: "The ultimate question is not the price per share or the profit, but rather the permissable standards of conduct for those who would takeover an American company," said burlington lawyer Humphrey.
